name: kensington-konnect-diagnostics-tool
description: Kensington Konnect Diagnostics Tool - Cross-platform CLI tool and Node.js library to collect system logs and device information

scripts.build: npm run build:cli && npm run build:libs
scripts.build-mac-x64: npm run build:cli && node scripts/build-pkg.js macos-x64
scripts.build-mac-arm64: npm run build:cli && node scripts/build-pkg.js macos-arm64
scripts.package-mac-x64: rimraf dist && npm run rebuild-usb-detection-x64 && npm run build-mac-x64 && npm run sign-mac -- x64 && npm run notarize-mac -- x64 && npm run create-pkg -- x64 && npm run sign-pkg -- x64 && npm run notarize-pkg -- x64 && node scripts/zip-and-move.js
scripts.package-mac-arm64: rimraf dist && npm run rebuild-usb-detection-arm64 && npm run build-mac-arm64 && npm run sign-mac -- arm64 && npm run notarize-mac -- arm64 && npm run create-pkg -- arm64 && npm run sign-pkg -- arm64 && npm run notarize-pkg -- arm64 && node scripts/zip-and-move.js
scripts.package-mac:all: npm run package-mac-x64 && npm run package-mac-arm64
scripts.build-win-x64: npm run build:cli && node scripts/build-pkg.js win-x64
scripts.package-win-x64: rimraf dist && npm run rebuild-usb-detection-x64 && npm run build-win-x64 && npm run sign-win -- x64 && node scripts/zip-and-move.js
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run publish:npm
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm run publish:npm
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && npm run publish:npm
scripts.publish:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.publish:alpha: npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && npm publish --tag alpha

author: JackyLin <loveguitar668@gmail.com>
